actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that a veteran entitled to inpatient care from the Department of Veterans Affairs shall also be entitled to the provision of nursing home care from that department.

summary.text: Requires (currently, permits) the Department of Veterans Affairs to furnish nursing home care to specified veterans.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that a veteran entitled to inpatient care from the Department of Veterans Affairs shall also be entitled to the provision of nursing home care from that department.
